verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> way·yiś·śā looked up ( Jacob Meets Esau) יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Now Jacob עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> ‘ê·nāw ... וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> way·yar and saw וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> wə·hin·nêh ... עֵשָׂ֣ו <WH6215> ‘ê·śāw Esau בָּ֔א <WH935> bā coming וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> wə·‘im·mōw toward him with אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> ’ar·ba‘ four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> mê·’ō·wṯ hundred אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> ’îš men. וַיַּ֣חַץ <WH2673> way·ya·ḥaṣ So he divided אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַיְלָדִ֗ים <WH3206> hay·lā·ḏîm the children עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- ... לֵאָה֙ <WH3812> lê·’āh among Leah, וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- ... רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> rā·ḥêl Rachel, וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> wə·‘al ... שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> šə·tê and the two הַשְּׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8198> haš·šə·p̄ā·ḥō·wṯ maidservants.

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> way·yā·śem He put אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <WH8198> haš·šə·p̄ā·ḥō·wṯ the maidservants וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- and their יַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <WH3206> yal·ḏê·hen children רִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> ri·šō·nāh in front, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - לֵאָ֤ה <WH3812> lê·’āh Leah וִֽילָדֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3206> wî·lā·ḏe·hā and her children אַחֲרֹנִ֔ים <WH314> ’a·ḥă·rō·nîm next, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - רָחֵ֥ל <WH7354> rā·ḥêl and Rachel וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ and Joseph אַחֲרֹנִֽים׃ <WH314> ’a·ḥă·rō·nîm at the rear.

וְה֖וּא <WH1931> wə·hū But [Jacob] himself עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> ‘ā·ḇar went on לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> lip̄·nê·hem ahead וַיִּשְׁתַּ֤חוּ <WH7812> way·yiš·ta·ḥū and bowed אַ֙רְצָה֙ <WH776> ’ar·ṣāh to the ground שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> še·ḇa‘ seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> pə·‘ā·mîm times עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- as גִּשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH5066> giš·tōw he approached עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- ... אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> ’ā·ḥîw his brother.

וַיָּ֨רָץ <WH7323> way·yā·rāṣ ran to him עֵשָׂ֤ו <WH6215> ‘ê·śāw Esau, however, לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <WH7122> liq·rā·ṯōw ... וַֽיְחַבְּקֵ֔הוּ <WH2263> way·ḥab·bə·qê·hū and embraced him, וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> way·yip·pōl threw his arms around עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- ... צַוָּארָ֖ו <WH6677> ṣaw·wå̄·rå̄w his neck, וַׄיִּׄשָּׁׄקֵ֑ׄהׄוּׄ <WH5401> way·yiš·šå̄·qē·hū and kissed him. וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <WH1058> way·yiḇ·kū And they both wept.

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> way·yiś·śā When Esau looked up אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> ‘ê·nāw - וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> way·yar and saw אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> han·nā·šîm the women וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> hay·lā·ḏîm and children, וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer he asked, מִי־ <WH4310> mî- “ Who אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh are these לָּ֑ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) with you? ” וַיֹּאמַ֕ר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mar) [Jacob] answered, הַיְלָדִ֕ים 3206 Art│N-mp ( hay·lā·ḏîm) “ [These are] the children אֲשֶׁר־ 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer-) - חָנַ֥ן 2603 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ḥā·nan) has graciously given אֱלֹהִ֖ים 430 N-mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hîm) God אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ 5650 N-msc│2ms ( ‘aḇ·de·ḵā) your servant. ”

וַתִּגַּ֧שְׁןָ <WH5066> wat·tig·gaš·nā approached הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <WH8198> haš·šə·p̄ā·ḥō·wṯ Then the maidservants הֵ֥נָּה <WH2007> hên·nāh and their וְיַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <WH3206> wə·yal·ḏê·hen children וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶֽיןָ׃ <WH7812> wat·tiš·ta·ḥă·we·nā and bowed down.

וַתִּגַּ֧שׁ <WH5066> wat·tig·gaš approached גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also לֵאָ֛ה <WH3812> lê·’āh Leah וִילָדֶ֖יהָ <WH3206> wî·lā·ḏe·hā and her children וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֑וּ <WH7812> way·yiš·ta·ḥă·wū and bowed down, וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> wə·’a·ḥar and then נִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> nig·gaš approached יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ Joseph וְרָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> wə·rā·ḥêl and Rachel וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֽוּ׃ <WH7812> way·yiš·ta·ḥă·wū and bowed down.

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer asked Esau. מִ֥י <WH4310> mî “ What לְךָ֛ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) do you mean כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) whole הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה 4264 Art│N-cs ( ham·ma·ḥă·neh) company הַזֶּ֖ה 2088 Art│Pro-ms ( haz·zeh) by sending this אֲשֶׁ֣ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - פָּגָ֑שְׁתִּי 6298 V-Qal-Perf-1cs ( pā·ḡā·šə·tî) to meet me? ” וַיֹּ֕אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) [Jacob] answered. לִמְצֹא־ 4672 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lim·ṣō-) “ To find חֵ֖ן 2580 N-ms ( ḥên) favor בְּעֵינֵ֥י 5869 Prep-b│N-cdc ( bə·‘ê·nê) in your sight, אֲדֹנִֽי׃ 113 N-msc│1cs ( ’ă·ḏō·nî) my lord, ”

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer replied. עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> ‘ê·śāw Esau יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yeš- “ I already have לִ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) רָ֑ב 7227 Adj-ms ( rāḇ) plenty, אָחִ֕י 251 N-msc│1cs ( ’ā·ḥî) my brother, ” יְהִ֥י 1961 V-Qal-Imperf. Jus-3ms ( yə·hî) “ Keep לְךָ֖ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) אֲשֶׁר־ 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer-) what belongs לָֽךְ׃ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) to you. ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer insisted, יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ But Jacob אַל־ <WH408> ’al- “ No, נָא֙ <WH4994> nā please! אִם־ <WH518> ’im- If נָ֨א <WH4994> nā ... מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> mā·ṣā·ṯî I have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> ḥên favor בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> bə·‘ê·ne·ḵā in your sight, וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> wə·lā·qaḥ·tā then receive מִנְחָתִ֖י <WH4503> min·ḥā·ṯî this gift מִיָּדִ֑י <WH3027> mî·yā·ḏî from my hand. כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî indeed, עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- For כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> kên ... רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> rā·’î·ṯî I have seen פָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> p̄ā·ne·ḵā your face, כִּרְאֹ֛ת <WH7200> kir·’ōṯ and it is like seeing פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pə·nê the face אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm of God, וַתִּרְצֵֽנִי׃ <WH7521> wat·tir·ṣê·nî since you have received me favorably.

קַח־ <WH3947> qaḥ- accept נָ֤א <WH4994> nā Please אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בִּרְכָתִי֙ <WH1293> bir·ḵā·ṯî my gift ( Or blessing or treaty of peace) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that הֻבָ֣את <WH935> hu·ḇāṯ was brought לָ֔ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) to you, כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) because חַנַּ֥נִי 2603 V-Qal-Perf-3ms│1cs ( ḥan·na·nî) has been gracious אֱלֹהִ֖ים 430 N-mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hîm) God וְכִ֣י 3588 Conj ( wə·ḵî) ... יֶשׁ־ 3426 Adv ( yeš-) and I have לִי־ Prep│1cs ( lî-) to me כֹ֑ל 3605 N-ms ( ḵōl) all I need. ” וַיִּפְצַר־ 6484 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yip̄·ṣar-) So Jacob pressed בּ֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) him וַיִּקָּֽח׃ 3947 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yiq·qāḥ) until he accepted.

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer Then Esau said, נִסְעָ֣ה <WH5265> nis·‘āh “ Let us be on our way וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <WH1980> wə·nê·lê·ḵāh ..., וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> wə·’ê·lə·ḵāh and I will go לְנֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5048> lə·neḡ·de·ḵā ahead of you. ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer But Jacob replied אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> ’ê·lāw ..., אֲדֹנִ֤י <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nî “ My lord יֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> yō·ḏê·a‘ knows כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- that הַיְלָדִ֣ים <WH3206> hay·lā·ḏîm the children רַכִּ֔ים <WH7390> rak·kîm are frail, וְהַצֹּ֥אן <WH6629> wə·haṣ·ṣōn sheep וְהַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> wə·hab·bā·qār and cattle עָל֣וֹת <WH5763> ‘ā·lō·wṯ that are nursing their young. עָלָ֑י <WH5921> ‘ā·lāy and I must care for וּדְפָקוּם֙ <WH1849> ū·ḏə·p̄ā·qūm If they are driven hard י֣וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm day, אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> ’e·ḥāḏ for even a וָמֵ֖תוּ <WH4191> wā·mê·ṯū will die. כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> haṣ·ṣōn the animals

יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> ya·‘ă·ḇār- go נָ֥א <WH4994> nā Please אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nî let my lord לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lip̄·nê ahead of עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> ‘aḇ·dōw his servant. וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> wa·’ă·nî I אֶֽתְנָהֲלָ֣ה <WH5095> ’eṯ·nā·hă·lāh will continue לְאִטִּ֗י <WH328> lə·’iṭ·ṭî on slowly, לְרֶ֨גֶל <WH7272> lə·re·ḡel at a comfortable pace הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <WH4399> ham·mə·lā·ḵāh for the livestock אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nay - וּלְרֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> ū·lə·re·ḡel ... הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> hay·lā·ḏîm and children, עַ֛ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - אָבֹ֥א <WH935> ’ā·ḇō I come אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nî my lord שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <WH8165> śê·‘î·rāh at Seir. ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said. עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> ‘ê·śāw Esau אַצִּֽיגָה־ <WH3322> ’aṣ·ṣî·ḡāh- “ Let me leave נָּ֣א <WH4994> nā ... עִמְּךָ֔ <WH5973> ‘im·mə·ḵā with you, ” מִן־ <WH4480> min- some of הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer my אִתִּ֑י <WH854> ’it·tî ... וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer But [Jacob] replied, לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> lām·māh “ Why זֶּ֔ה <WH2088> zeh do that? אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> ’em·ṣā- Let me find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> ḥên favor בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> bə·‘ê·nê in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nî of my lord. ”

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> way·yā·šāḇ back בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> bay·yō·wm day הַה֥וּא <WH1931> ha·hū So that עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> ‘ê·śāw Esau לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> lə·ḏar·kōw started on his way שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <WH8165> śê·‘î·rāh to Seir,

וְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> wə·ya·‘ă·qōḇ but Jacob נָסַ֣ע <WH5265> nā·sa‘ went on סֻכֹּ֔תָה <WH5523> suk·kō·ṯāh to Succoth, ( Succoth means booths or shelters or tabernacles; twice in this verse.) וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> way·yi·ḇen where he built ל֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) for himself בָּ֑יִת 1004 N-ms ( bā·yiṯ) a house וּלְמִקְנֵ֙הוּ֙ 4735 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-msc│3ms ( ū·lə·miq·nê·hū) for his livestock; עָשָׂ֣ה 6213 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ‘ā·śāh) ... סֻכֹּ֔ת 5521 N-fp ( suk·kōṯ) and shelters עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) that is why כֵּ֛ן 3651 Adv ( kên) ... קָרָ֥א 7121 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( qā·rā) was called שֵׁם־ 8034 N-msc ( šêm-) ... הַמָּק֖וֹם 4725 Art│N-ms ( ham·mā·qō·wm) the place סֻכּֽוֹת׃ס 5523 N-proper-fs ( suk·kō·wṯ) Succoth.

וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> way·yā·ḇō had come ( Jacob Settles in Shechem) יַעֲקֹ֨ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ After Jacob שָׁלֵ֜ם <WH8003> šā·lêm safely עִ֣יר <WH5892> ‘îr at the city שְׁכֶ֗ם <WH7927> šə·ḵem of Shechem אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ’ă·šer - בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> bə·’e·reṣ in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> kə·na·‘an of Canaan, בְּבֹא֖וֹ <WH935> bə·ḇō·’ōw he arrived מִפַּדַּ֣ן <WH6307> mip·pad·dan vvv אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> ’ă·rām from Paddan-aram, ( That is, northwest Mesopotamia) וַיִּ֖חַן <WH2583> way·yi·ḥan and he camped אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- ... פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pə·nê just outside הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> hā·‘îr the city.
